Title: Select a random number from an array and then remove that number
Mips jump back to a branch statement
BodyMarkdown:
I'm having a lot of trouble trying to figure out how to implement this in the Mips/Mars architecture.

I'm making a Battleship game and storing the board as an array that can hold 100 ints.

I need to loop through the player's array and convert the information stored in each 'cell' to graphical data for the purpose of displaying the board to the user.

My troubles stem from the fact that the characters being displayed to the user are based on what values are in each cell of the array.

If the value is 0 (empty) - print '[ ]', if 1 (guessed and empty) print - '[O]', and if 2 (guessed and hit) print - '[X]'.

So as I'm looping through each cell in the array, I need to check the value and branch to the appropriate print function.

My problem is that if I branch to the print statement, how do I jump back to where the branch statement was?

Pseudo code:
Looping through array, 'ArrayCell' = value at current array location
branch if equal ArrayCell, 0, print empty
branch if equal ArrayCell, 1, print miss
branch if equal ArrayCell, 2, print hit
increment array

print empty:
print then jump back to loop
print miss:
print then jump back to loop
print hit:
print then jump back to loop

How do you jump back to the branch statement after printing to preserve where you are in the array?

Many thanks!
TitleConcatWithBody:
Mips jump back to a branch statement I'm having a lot of trouble trying to figure out how to implement this in the Mips/Mars architecture.

I'm making a Battleship game and storing the board as an array that can hold 100 ints.

I need to loop through the player's array and convert the information stored in each 'cell' to graphical data for the purpose of displaying the board to the user.

My troubles stem from the fact that the characters being displayed to the user are based on what values are in each cell of the array.

If the value is 0 (empty) - print '[ ]', if 1 (guessed and empty) print - '[O]', and if 2 (guessed and hit) print - '[X]'.

So as I'm looping through each cell in the array, I need to check the value and branch to the appropriate print function.

My problem is that if I branch to the print statement, how do I jump back to where the branch statement was?

Pseudo code:
Looping through array, 'ArrayCell' = value at current array location
branch if equal ArrayCell, 0, print empty
branch if equal ArrayCell, 1, print miss
branch if equal ArrayCell, 2, print hit
increment array

print empty:
print then jump back to loop
print miss:
print then jump back to loop
print hit:
print then jump back to loop

How do you jump back to the branch statement after printing to preserve where you are in the array?

Many thanks!

Title: Where to declare arrays when you have a main form that uses many class programs in C#
BodyMarkdown: Pls, i have an issue and will be very glad if you can help solve it. I have an assignment due for submission anytime soon. The issue is in the assignment I'm required to make use of class programs and database. I absolutely have no problem with the database, just the class. The classes are discountClothingSale class, and clothingSale. The main form uses either of the classes depending on whether the discount check box is checked. If the check box is checked it makes use of the discountClothingSale class to get the price due or otherwisw. My issue now is I want to declare a set of array that holds some values such as the product ID, product name, quantity, product price, the discount given if discount is checked, the amount due after discount, and the total. also i want to include an array that holds some details of the customer gotten from the customer database whose fields are displayed on the form. The structure will include customer name, address, postcode, state and phone no. At the end of the order, i want to be able to print an invoice that has the customer details from the array on the top of the invoice / receipt, and below will be the order details like the product and prices e.t.c. Now I do not know where to declare the array structure, whether in the main form or in the other classes. Please Help. Thanks

Title: xcode - leaks from nowhere, what am I doing wrong?
Adding items to Rails 3 array onclick
BodyMarkdown:
I'm working on a Rails 3 app where a user's profile `has_many :todos`. The user has two categories of `:todos` through a join model `:profile_todos` with `t.string`.

What I want to do is count the `:todos` and add to (and list) the items in the categories, which are `:todos_outside` and `:todos_inside`.

**Profile Model:**

    class Profile < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :user
      has_many :todos, :through => :profile_todos
      has_many :profile_todos

      def add_todo_inside_item(item)
        self.profile_todos.build :category => 'inside'
      end

      def add_todo_outside_item(item)
        self.profile_todos.build :category => 'outside'
      end

**ProfileTodo Model:**

    class ProfileTodo < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :profile
      belongs_to :todo
    end

**Todo Model:**

    class Todos < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :profile
    end

What would be the best method to:

 1. Add values to the user's `:profile_todos` categories? (If it's best to use onclick can you provide an example on a `<%= link_to %>`? Though I see onclick was removed from Rails 3.)
 2. List the values in those categories in the user's profile?

Any help would be much appreciated as I'm a beginner.

Adding items to Rails 3 array onclick I'm working on a Rails 3 app where a user's profile `has_many :todos`. The user has two categories of `:todos` through a join model `:profile_todos` with `t.string`.

What I want to do is count the `:todos` and add to (and list) the items in the categories, which are `:todos_outside` and `:todos_inside`.

**Profile Model:**

    class Profile < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :user
      has_many :todos, :through => :profile_todos
      has_many :profile_todos

      def add_todo_inside_item(item)
        self.profile_todos.build :category => 'inside'
      end

      def add_todo_outside_item(item)
        self.profile_todos.build :category => 'outside'
      end

**ProfileTodo Model:**

    class ProfileTodo < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :profile
      belongs_to :todo
    end

**Todo Model:**

    class Todos < ActiveRecord::Base
      belongs_to :profile
    end

What would be the best method to:

 1. Add values to the user's `:profile_todos` categories? (If it's best to use onclick can you provide an example on a `<%= link_to %>`? Though I see onclick was removed from Rails 3.)
 2. List the values in those categories in the user's profile?

Any help would be much appreciated as I'm a beginner.

Title: Finding contiguous blocks in a 2D array
BodyMarkdown:
Say you had an array in the form:

    [ 
      [2, 2, 3, 4],
      [2, 3, 5, 5],
      [2, 2, 2, 5],
      [3, 2, 2, 4],
    ]

and wanted to find coordinates of numerically contiguous blocks, in this case:

    [
      # the 2s:
      [(0,0), (0,1), (1,0), (2,0), (2,1), (2,2), (3,1), (3,2)],
      # and the 5s:
      [(1,2), (1,3), (2,3)]
    ]

how would you do it?
TitleConcatWithBody:
Finding contiguous blocks in a 2D array Say you had an array in the form:

    [ 
      [2, 2, 3, 4],
      [2, 3, 5, 5],
      [2, 2, 2, 5],
      [3, 2, 2, 4],
    ]

and wanted to find coordinates of numerically contiguous blocks, in this case:

    [
      # the 2s:
      [(0,0), (0,1), (1,0), (2,0), (2,1), (2,2), (3,1), (3,2)],
      # and the 5s:
      [(1,2), (1,3), (2,3)]
    ]

how would you do it?

Title: Scoping Issue with PHP Arrays
BodyMarkdown: I'm trying to solve this problem where I have a unique array of values within a specific range. Take this scenario: Generate a fixed value array (90) with unique entries. If you find a duplicate, remove, reindex, and fill the void. I'm running into the problem that conditional statements do not allow you to interact with an array outside of it's scope. I'm aware of `array_unique` but it doesn't refill those gaps, just makes them. How do I refill those gaps?
TitleConcatWithBody: Scoping Issue with PHP Arrays I'm trying to solve this problem where I have a unique array of values within a specific range. Take this scenario: Generate a fixed value array (90) with unique entries. If you find a duplicate, remove, reindex, and fill the void. I'm running into the problem that conditional statements do not allow you to interact with an array outside of it's scope. I'm aware of `array_unique` but it doesn't refill those gaps, just makes them. How do I refill those gaps?

Title: Retrieving Binary data from SQL in VB6
BodyMarkdown:
If you have a column of type binary in SQL and return it using ADODB in VB6 even if the column contains only 1 byte of data it must be stored as a byte array.

So for example:


    Dim cm As ADODB.Command
    Dim rs As ADODB.Recordset

    Set cm = New ADODB.Command
    Set rs = New ADODB.Recordset

    With cm
        .ActiveConnection = cn
        .CommandTimeout = 30
        .CommandType = adCmdText
        .CommandText = "SELECT * FROM Table WHERE RowID = ?"
        .Parameters.Append .CreateParameter("TableID", adInteger, adParamInput, , TableID)
    End With
    
    RecordsetOpen cn, rs, cm, , adOpenForwardOnly, adLockReadOnly

    With rs
        If .State = adStateOpen Then
            If .RecordCount > 0 Then
                Dim tempArray() As Byte
                tempArray = .Fields("BinaryColumn")
                ''Success! Returns array containing 1 Byte in it

                Dim value as Byte
                value = .Fields("BinaryColumn")
                ''Fails! Run-Time error '13' Type Mismatch
            End If
        End If
    End With

Allot of people would look at that and say "So what? Its failing with a type mismatch because you have a Byte() and are trying to set a Byte!".

My argument is Fields.Value is a property of Type Variant and given VB6s liberal policies on typecasting I would have figured something like this would work.

Could someone explain why this fails?
TitleConcatWithBody:
Retrieving Binary data from SQL in VB6 If you have a column of type binary in SQL and return it using ADODB in VB6 even if the column contains only 1 byte of data it must be stored as a byte array.

So for example:


    Dim cm As ADODB.Command
    Dim rs As ADODB.Recordset

    Set cm = New ADODB.Command
    Set rs = New ADODB.Recordset

    With cm
        .ActiveConnection = cn
        .CommandTimeout = 30
        .CommandType = adCmdText
        .CommandText = "SELECT * FROM Table WHERE RowID = ?"
        .Parameters.Append .CreateParameter("TableID", adInteger, adParamInput, , TableID)
    End With
    
    RecordsetOpen cn, rs, cm, , adOpenForwardOnly, adLockReadOnly

    With rs
        If .State = adStateOpen Then
            If .RecordCount > 0 Then
                Dim tempArray() As Byte
                tempArray = .Fields("BinaryColumn")
                ''Success! Returns array containing 1 Byte in it

                Dim value as Byte
                value = .Fields("BinaryColumn")
                ''Fails! Run-Time error '13' Type Mismatch
            End If
        End If
    End With

Allot of people would look at that and say "So what? Its failing with a type mismatch because you have a Byte() and are trying to set a Byte!".

My argument is Fields.Value is a property of Type Variant and given VB6s liberal policies on typecasting I would have figured something like this would work.

Could someone explain why this fails?

Title: change multidimensional array to single array
Recursive array correct method of display
php session &array
BodyMarkdown:
I have problem with session variables.

When i am in root folder 

    www.domain.com/index.php
    array(2) { ["sessionvariables"]=> array(6) {......}

and print_r SESSION i see the vars without & in front 

when i am in a directory

    www.domain.com/directory/index.php
    array(2) { ["sessionvariables"]=> &array(6) {......}

and print_r SESSION i see the vars WITH & in front 

As far as i know this is happening (the & in front of var) when register_global is On but in my case is Off

This is cause me problems because it seems that session variables are register and confused with other variables in my code

Any help appreciated.
TitleConcatWithBody:
php session &array I have problem with session variables.

When i am in root folder 

    www.domain.com/index.php
    array(2) { ["sessionvariables"]=> array(6) {......}

and print_r SESSION i see the vars without & in front 

when i am in a directory

    www.domain.com/directory/index.php
    array(2) { ["sessionvariables"]=> &array(6) {......}

and print_r SESSION i see the vars WITH & in front 

As far as i know this is happening (the & in front of var) when register_global is On but in my case is Off

This is cause me problems because it seems that session variables are register and confused with other variables in my code

Any help appreciated.

Title: How can loop through perl constant
CUDA shared memory not faster than global?
BodyMarkdown:
Hi i have kernel function, where i need to compare bytes. Area where i want to search is divided into blocks, so array of 4k bytes is divided to 4k/256 = 16 blocks. Each thread in block reads array on idx and compare it with another array, where is what i want to search. I've done this by two ways:

1.Compare data in global memory, but often threads in block need to read the same address. 

2.Copy data from global memory to shared memory, and compare bytes in shared memory in the same way as mentioned above. Still problem with same address read.
Copy to shared memory looks like this: 

    myArray[idx] = global[someIndex-idx];
    whatToSearch[idx] = global[someIndex+idx];

Rest of the code is the same. Only operations on data in example 2 are performed in shared arrays.

But first option is about 10% faster, than that with the shared memory, why?? Thank you for explanations.
TitleConcatWithBody:
CUDA shared memory not faster than global? Hi i have kernel function, where i need to compare bytes. Area where i want to search is divided into blocks, so array of 4k bytes is divided to 4k/256 = 16 blocks. Each thread in block reads array on idx and compare it with another array, where is what i want to search. I've done this by two ways:

1.Compare data in global memory, but often threads in block need to read the same address. 

2.Copy data from global memory to shared memory, and compare bytes in shared memory in the same way as mentioned above. Still problem with same address read.
Copy to shared memory looks like this: 

    myArray[idx] = global[someIndex-idx];
    whatToSearch[idx] = global[someIndex+idx];

Rest of the code is the same. Only operations on data in example 2 are performed in shared arrays.

But first option is about 10% faster, than that with the shared memory, why?? Thank you for explanations.

Title: How to add an array values into another array?
BodyMarkdown:
I have two array of values and their keys...
**First array**
Array ( [0] => Array ( [10] => A1 [11] => A2 ) [1] => Array ( [12] => B1 [13] => B2 ) ) **Second array**
Array ( [1] => Z1 [2] => Z2 ) I want to group these two array into a single array. I mean the array format should be. Array ( [0] => Array ( [1] => Z1 [10] => A1 [11] => A2 ) [1] => Array ( [2] => Z2 [12] => B1 [13] => B2 ) ) I tried with array_push but add the entire array in the [0] position or in the [2] position in the second array.
Anyone has any ideas? thanks

Title: Resetting / Reordering KEYS for array in actionscript
How to handle with arrays withing different loops in XSLT
BodyMarkdown:
I have a problem with processing following xml code: Column1 TEXT Column2 DATE SHORT_DATE Column1 DATE DATETIME Column1 NUMBER Hello 2012-07-12 2012-07-12 - 14:12:31 31.5 Good bye 2012-07-12 2012-07-12 - 14:15:11 0 I need to transform this xml to EXCEL compatible file (I use urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office, urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:excel and urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet namespaces for it) Problem is that I don't know how to apply information from head/heading elements dataType + dataFormat (if available) on row/column/value. This will help Excel to recognize which datatype is inside its cells. It is obvious that i need to preserve order so. Number of columns and its metadata is dynamic and each XML may differ. I need to get something like this: Column1 Column2 Column3 Column4 Hello : TEXT 2012-07-12 : DATE - SHORT_DATE 2012-07-12 - 14:12:31 : DATE - DATETIME 31.5 : NUMBER Good bye : TEXT 2012-07-12 : DATE - SHORT_DATE 2012-07-12 - 14:15:11 : DATE - DATETIME 0 : NUMBER
I tried a few times create something useful and working but all my attempts fail. Current version is here: SearchResult
String Number DateTime This version is useless because I cannot use as name of variable any variable value, it must be constant value. Parsing whole data works somehow, but when I tried to implement datatype and data format it broke.
TitleConcatWithBody:
How to handle with arrays withing different loops in XSLT I have a problem with processing following xml code: Column1 TEXT Column2 DATE SHORT_DATE Column1 DATE DATETIME Column1 NUMBER Hello 2012-07-12 2012-07-12 - 14:12:31 31.5 Good bye 2012-07-12 2012-07-12 - 14:15:11 0 I need to transform this xml to EXCEL compatible file (I use urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office, urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:excel and urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet namespaces for it) Problem is that I don't know how to apply information from head/heading elements dataType + dataFormat (if available) on row/column/value. This will help Excel to recognize which datatype is inside its cells. It is obvious that i need to preserve order so. Number of columns and its metadata is dynamic and each XML may differ. I need to get something like this: Column1 Column2 Column3 Column4 Hello : TEXT 2012-07-12 : DATE - SHORT_DATE 2012-07-12 - 14:12:31 : DATE - DATETIME 31.5 : NUMBER Good bye : TEXT 2012-07-12 : DATE - SHORT_DATE 2012-07-12 - 14:15:11 : DATE - DATETIME 0 : NUMBER
I tried a few times create something useful and working but all my attempts fail. Current version is here: SearchResult
String Number DateTime This version is useless because I cannot use as name of variable any variable value, it must be constant value. Parsing whole data works somehow, but when I tried to implement datatype and data format it broke.

Title: Array subgroups
BodyMarkdown:
I have an arbitrary array of lego bricks. I also have some figures made of 3 lego bricks. I want to find out how many combinations of figures I can create of the current array of lego bricks.

Anybody have some references for me, so I can solve this problem?

Which algorithms can I use? Any theory I can use?

Thank you in advance for any help you can provide.

/Hans
